review:
Super talented, full of knowledge and a very kind generous human being. A doctor with immense tricks, suggestions, a solution to all ortho problems, full of experience, available at odd times too, fabulous person.
We suggest Dr. nargesh Agarwal to all the people with ortho related issues.

review: Very friendly and experienced, Tell each and everything about your problems deeply and explain it. I felt relax and satisfied after meeting him
